channel.title: Compiling error when going live with any patch
channel.description:
I just received my Axoloti and am really looking forward to playing with it. So far I'm having trouble compiling anything at all. When checking the 'Live' checkbox I get the following error message:
Generate code complete Start compiling patch Compiling patch... with /Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/firmware BDIR = /Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/build FIRMWARE = . Build precompiled header arm-none-eabi-g++ -nostdlib -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -mcpu=cortex-m4 -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer -falign-functions=16 -mfloat-abi=hard -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -Wunused-parameter -DCORTEX_USE_FPU=TRUE -DTHUMB_PRESENT -mno-thumb-interwork -DTHUMB_NO_INTERWORKING -mthumb -DTHUMB -std=c++11 -DARM_MATH_CM4 -D__FPU_PRESENT -fno-math-errno -fno-threadsafe-statics -fno-use-cxa-atexit -Wno-unused-parameter -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/CMSIS/Include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/CMSIS/DSP_Lib/Include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/common/ARMCMx/CMSIS/include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/common/ARMCMx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/GCC/ARMCMx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/GCC/ARMCMx/STM32F4xx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/kernel/include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32F4xx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/GPIOv2 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/I2Cv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/OTGv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/RTCv2 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/SPIv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/TIMv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/USARTv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/boards/ST_STM32F4_DISCOVERY -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/ext/fatfs/src -I. -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios -I./mutable_instruments -Winvalid-pch -MD -MP -c ./xpatch.h -o /Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch make: arm-none-eabi-g++: No such file or directory make: *** [/Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch] Error 1 shell task failed, exit value: 2 Compiling patch failed ( /Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-factory/patches/tutorials/01_sine_oscillator.axp )
I'm running the Patcher on Mac OS X. Would really appreciate if anyone could help out a newbie. Cheers

item.title: Compiling error when going live with any patch
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

No worries , glad your up and running

Happy patching.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling error when going live with any patch

item.title: Compiling error when going live with any patch
item.dc:creator: @phoi
item.description:
@phoi wrote:

I missed the user guide section! Really sorry to bother you with something so trivial. Everything works great now. Thanks a lot!

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling error when going live with any patch

item.title: Compiling error when going live with any patch
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

phoi:

make: arm-none-eabi-g++: No such file or directory

it would appear you have not installed the runtime (or at least correctly), as this file is provide by this.

please read steps in the user guide section, particularly:

Installing on Mac OS X User Guide
Normal Installation To reduce size we split the application into two parts, the main axoloti application, and a runtime which contains other required files. You must download and install both initially. (Usually updates will only require the main application to be downloaded and installed.) download both application bundle and axoloti_runtime go to http://github.com/axoloti/axoloti/releases, you will see the 'latest release' download axo_runtime_osx_(version).dmg download axoloti_osx_(versâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling error when going live with any patch

item.title: Compiling error when going live with any patch
item.dc:creator: @phoi
item.description:
@phoi wrote:

I just received my Axoloti and am really looking forward to playing with it. So far I'm having trouble compiling anything at all. When checking the 'Live' checkbox I get the following error message:

Generate code complete
Start compiling patch
Compiling patch... with /Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/firmware
BDIR = /Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/build
FIRMWARE = .
Build precompiled header
arm-none-eabi-g++ -nostdlib -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -mcpu=cortex-m4 -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer -falign-functions=16 -mfloat-abi=hard -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -Wunused-parameter -DCORTEX_USE_FPU=TRUE -DTHUMB_PRESENT -mno-thumb-interwork -DTHUMB_NO_INTERWORKING -mthumb -DTHUMB -std=c++11 -DARM_MATH_CM4 -D__FPU_PRESENT -fno-math-errno -fno-threadsafe-statics -fno-use-cxa-atexit -Wno-unused-parameter -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/CMSIS/Include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/CMSIS/DSP_Lib/Include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/common/ARMCMx/CMSIS/include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/common/ARMCMx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/GCC/ARMCMx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/ports/GCC/ARMCMx/STM32F4xx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/kernel/include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/include -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32F4xx -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/GPIOv2 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/I2Cv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/OTGv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/RTCv2 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/SPIv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/TIMv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/os/hal/platforms/STM32/USARTv1 -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/boards/ST_STM32F4_DISCOVERY -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios/ext/fatfs/src -I. -I/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/chibios -I./mutable_instruments -Winvalid-pch -MD -MP -c ./xpatch.h -o /Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch
make: arm-none-eabi-g++: No such file or directory
make: *** [/Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch] Error 1
shell task failed, exit value: 2
Compiling patch failed ( /Users/poulhoi/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-factory/patches/tutorials/01_sine_oscillator.axp )

I'm running the Patcher on Mac OS X. Would really appreciate if anyone could help out a newbie. Cheers
